body_html:
Does turning num_true into a scalar tensor make sense at at?

The only advantage I can see for having num_true at all, is to allow shape calculation before the graph is executed.

But with that advantage gone, the value for num_true might just be taken as the second dimension of the shape of the "labels" tensor. Maybe it would make sense to simply do that if the value "-1" is passed in as num_true value?
